content:
Io Hartman is a photographer based in Boulder CO and is a junior studying media journalism and political science at The University of Colorado Boulder PERIOD As a portrait and documentary photographer she is driven to do work that captures community and systemic change PERIOD Outside of photography and journalism one can find Io watching movies and shows with friends thrifting and showing up to everything creatively overdressed PERIOD
